name: mathsys
description: The Domain Specific Language for math.

scripts.compile/unix/x86/64: find python/mathsys/bin/unix/x86/64 -name '*.asm' | entr -c sh -c 'for f in python/mathsys/bin/unix/x86/64/*.asm; do nasm -f elf64 "$f" -o "${f%.asm}.o"; done'
scripts.compile/web: find python/mathsys/bin/web -name '*.wat' | entr -c sh -c 'for f in python/mathsys/bin/web/*.wat; do wat2wasm "$f" -r -o "${f%.wat}.wasm"; wasm-ld -flavor wasm -r "${f%.wat}.wasm" -o "${f%.wat}.o"; rm "${f%.wat}.wasm"; done'

author: alejandro-vaz
